body_html:
@alexggmatthews Sorry yes I did mean MH. Thanks for the link - I think I am biased(..) because in astronomy, where fully bayesian methods have made great leaps, I haven't yet seen a decent, available HMC implementation - that method in particular seems to have been fraught with difficulty - and I haven't understood why.

So I will watch this space......

body:
@alexggmatthews Sorry yes I did mean MH. Thanks for the link - I think I am biased(..) because in astronomy, where fully bayesian methods have made great leaps, I haven't yet seen a decent, available HMC implementation - that method in particular seems to have been fraught with difficulty - and I haven't understood why.

So I will watch this space......
